mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry ( inq_num, mem_num, title, content, reg_date, status ) VALUES ( inquiry_seq.nextval, #{mem_num}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, '답변대기' )
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET answer = #{answer}, answer_date = SYSDATE, status = '답변완료' WHERE inq_num = #{inq_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM inquiry ORDER BY reg_date DESC
